<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Giant Hermit Crab](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1107)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Lucky hermit crabs with plentiful resources can live for decades and grow to tremendous sizes, often with magical help. Too large for most natural shells, giant hermit crabs use a variety of debris instead, including wagons, boats, treasure chests, and even abandoned pieces of giant armor.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 20

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 15
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Crab_GiantHermitCrab.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 5">[Giant Hermit Crab](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1107)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Amphibious" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=207" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=9" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 57</row>

**Perception** +13; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [tremorsense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=40) (imprecise) 15 feet

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +15, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +6

**Dex** +2

**Con** +4

**Int** -4

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 21 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +9 

</row>

**HP** 114

**Weaknesses**
bludgeoning 5

**Protective Pinch** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** A creature adjacent to the hermit crab attempts to Strike the hermit crab while it is Retracted; **Effect** The hermit crab makes a big claw Strike against the triggering creature.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, climb 10 feet, swim 15 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
big claw +15,
**Damage** 2d8+8 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +15 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170)),
**Damage** 2d4+8 piercing

**[Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=10)** <actions string="Single Action" />  1d8+6 bludgeoning, DC 22

**Retract** <actions string="Single Action" />  The hermit crab curls fully into its shell to protect itself. This gives it a +4 circumstance bonus to AC, removes its weakness to bludgeoning damage, and grants it resistance 5 to piercing and slashing damage. The only actions the hermit crab can use while in this state are Protective Pinch and Interact to come out of its shell.

</column>

name: Giant Hermit Crab
